comet.agent.training.metrices.torch_metric.accuracy(input, targs)[source]¶
Computes accuracy with targs when input is bs * n_classes.

input: torch.Size([64, 10])- targs: torch.Size([64])

comet.agent.training.metrices.torch_metric.accuracy_thresh(y_pred, y_true, thresh=0.5, sigmoid=True)[source]¶

Computes accuracy when y_pred and y_true are the same size.

comet.agent.training.metrices.torch_metric.dice(input, targs, iou=False, eps=1e-08)[source]¶

Dice coefficient metric for binary target. If iou=True, returns iou metric, classic for segmentation problems.
